<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/workflow/{workflowId}/cancel"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Cancels the workflow execution identified by the given `workflowId`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"workflowId","in":"path","description":"Workflow string identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"workspaceId","in":"query","description":"Workspace numeric identifier","schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
